class.name: byte_array_controllers/ByteArrayStateController
class.description: The ByteArrayStateController populates all hardware_interface_extensions/ByteArrayHandles on the hardware_interface_extensions/ByteArrayStateInterface and publishes data from the handles as a std_msgs/ByteMultiArray msg.

class.name: byte_array_controllers/ByteArrayCommandController
class.description: This controller subscribes std_msgs::ByteMultiarray and forwards it to the hardware as commands.
